name: Shyler Richards Fort Lytton
description:
To play the game once downloaded unzip the file and click on the SR_VE Application you will need an HTC vive VR device. 

WARNING. Due to some technical issues some of the controls do not work but exploration is still possible. 

Star Reality at Fort Lytton is a virtual recreation of the Fort Lytton base in Brisbane. 

The theme is Sci-fi mystery where the base seems to have ended up in a space like void. You are an unknown individual that has ended up in this distorted space. your objective is to destroyed the crystals and get back home but is it truly that simple? 

VR Interactions: 

Pickup able objects in the environment like paper and flashlights. 
A toggle for the flashlights. 
Crystals destroyed upon touch. 
Menu buttons acting as restart level and quitgame.
